title: GeochronologicInterpretation
description: A <font color="#4f81bd">GeochronologicInterpretation</font> is an interpretation made by a geologist of the age of a specimen made by statistical analysis of a collection of observations.  A geologic specimen may have multiple geochronological interpretations made on it, each related to a different observation/result collection.

interpretedAge.title: interpretedAge
interpretedAge.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">interpretedAge</font> property is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">GeochronologicInterpretation</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">GeologicEvent</font> that describes the dated event, process and environment.

isotopicEvent-1.title: isotopicEvent
isotopicEvent-1.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">isotopicEvent:IsotopicEventType</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes any isotopic events that are relevant to the interpretation. e.g., closure, isotopic mixing, Pb loss, etc.

isotopicEvent-2.title: isotopicEvent
isotopicEvent-2.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">isotopicEvent:IsotopicEventType</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes any isotopic events that are relevant to the interpretation. e.g., closure, isotopic mixing, Pb loss, etc.

isotopicEvent-3.title: isotopicEvent
isotopicEvent-3.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">isotopicEvent:IsotopicEventType</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes any isotopic events that are relevant to the interpretation. e.g., closure, isotopic mixing, Pb loss, etc.

isotopicSystem.title: isotopicSystem
isotopicSystem.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">isotopicSystem:IsotopicSystemName</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes the isotopic system used to calculate geochronological age. A vocabulary would contain values such as: Ar-Ar, K-Ar, Nd-Sm, Pb-Pb, Rb-Sr, Re-Os, U-Pb, etc.

statisticalMethod.title: statisticalMethod
statisticalMethod.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">statisticalMethod:StatisticalMethodTerm</font> contains a term from a controlled vocabulary that describes the statistical method used to interpret the results.  (e.g., weighted mean, median, concordia, discordia, etc)

interpretedBy.title: interpretedBy
interpretedBy.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">interpretedBy</font> is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">GeochronologicInterpretation</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_Responsability</font> describing the party responsible for this interpretation.

citation.title: citation
citation.description: The <font color="#4f81bd">citation</font> property is an association between a <font color="#4f81bd">GeochronologicInterpretation</font> and a <font color="#4f81bd">CIT:CI_Citation</font> that describes authors and other reference information for an interpreted age.

preferredInterpretation.title: preferredInterpretation
preferredInterpretation.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">preferredInterpretation:Primitive::Boolean</font> indicates whether this interpretation is the preferred interpretation (i.e., the analytical data may be reinterpreted).

sourceCollection.title: sourceCollection
sourceCollection.description: The property sourceCollection is an association between a GeochronologicInterpretation and an OM::SF_SamplingFeatureCollection that lists a collection of OM::SF_SamplingFeature (e.g., a collection of burn spots or craters from a SHRIMP analytical session).  When legacy published data for which the SamplingFeatureCollection is unknown, it may be delivered with SamplingFeatureCollection = 'unknown'.
